unnormalised: Arre bhai, I lost my PNR no. for the train to Jaipur, can someone help? It was booked under Rakesh Sharma, confirmed ticket, but can't find the SMS!
normalised: Arre bhai, I lost my P-N-R number for the train to Jaipur, can someone help? It was booked under Rakesh Sharma, confirmed ticket, but can't find the S-M-S!
